timeline.bodyText:
@0blivious , why you escaping quotes ?
it is ok, but it works now well for javadoc and website , the less quotes the better to my mind .
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText: This was going on in the other PRs as well. If we wish to enforce one over the other, than we should add it as part of a UT or checkstyle.
replies.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText: How is this an overridden method?
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText: Please use some name of Object class
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: @romani Do we really need message override? It is not in the description and the message is not that drastic different than the default.
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText: Let's keep it, not sure why it is there, Git history might able to answer.
replies.author: romani
